description:
The gods begin their school life at Zeus` orders.
Yui suggests holding a seaside school to encourage the gods ignoring Zeus` orders and skipping class to begin attending classes.
The day of the seaside school, with the help of Apollon, Tsukito, and Baldr, Hades, Takeru and even Loki show up.
Everyone is excited when they arrive at the beach. Just when the gods change into their swim trunks to go swimming--?!
Source: crunchyroll
